relation: Very safe and neat. No smoking policy which is great.
There are LOTS of clubs there almost for every occupation your looking to get into.
It is worth your money to go there.
Co-Ed softball team. Also there are plenty of fun events and games you are able to do. Also there is a room where people are able to socialize and play pool. ECT.
Good food and also have a lot of choices. It just can be very spendy.
No dorms, but there are apartments near by.
The teachers there are a lot of fun. But some of the teachers I had taken just did not catch my interest.
Try to always be on time. Also make sure you have a relationship with your teachers it will help a lot.
Its a very friendly school which has all age groups of people. Also the school is clean and has a lot of fun activities your able to do. Would definitely recommend this school.
pageTitle: Inver Hills Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {39937=Connect with your professors--I have not been a student there since winter of 2010 and I still keep in touch with some of my favorite professors. One has wrote me a letter of recommendation to study abroad in Australia., 63226=Take speech and writing 1108 the first term, even if you dislike English. These classes will set you up for future sucess for the remainder of your college years. Most every class I had taken required some sort of 3 to 7 page written paper. Many others required giving presentations to the class., 102559=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Bang for the buck The tuition is the cheapest I have seen for a great quality of learning What to do for fun Free movie nights Food and Dining Food is a little spendy Dorm Life They do not have dorms. Tips for prospective students If you are busy and still would like a obtain further schooling, this is the school for you. The rates are reasonable and the teachers there treat you as an equal. In three sentences I rate this school a 10 out of 10 for having the fleixble hours, great rates and access to many academic resources. I appreciate that I am able to obtain my dream job qualifications while being a mother and working a full time job. This school has given me opportunity to do it all.
